servinfo.title: Front Fog Light Switch Inspection (If Equipped)

attention3.ptxt: Front fog lights light up only when headlight switch is in HEADLIGHT position (low or high beams) or SMALL position. Front fog lights turn OFF automatically when headlight switch is turned to OFF position. If front fog light switch holds ON position, front fog lights turn ON automatically when headlight switch is tuned to HEADLIGHT position (low or high beams) or SMALL position again.

servinfo.ptxt: Check for continuity between terminals at each switch position. If check result is not as specified, replace switch.
